title: League Client is Broken

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I opened up LoL and this occured. My friends list is not visible, but also when I try to queue up for a game it will go into my queue, but when my queue "pops" the accept button is not visible as well. Any suggestions on how to fix? :3

replies.body: Since the chat portion of the client has it's own connection that needs to be made in order to see your friends, it looks like your network is having a hard time building that connection for some strange reason. Try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your client isn't hitting any bumps along the way to our servers.
